title: Beer 30
summary: Android Wear app that counts the amount of drinks you've had on your wrist!
description: This is a small android wear app that counts the amount of drinks you've had all from your wrist! Press the beer mug every time you have a drink that way you'll have an accurate count for the night! This is a standalone android wear app so there's no messy phone component.
descriptionHTML: This is a small android wear app that counts the amount of drinks you've had all from your wrist! Press the beer mug every time you have a drink that way you'll have an accurate count for the night! This is a standalone android wear app so there's no messy phone component.
comments: Wow!! Before Beer 30 I didn't know what to do with my life. After I downloaded the app, everything changed!!! I learned how to count, I learned how to see, how to walk, how to talk.
